title: Kevin Lo
subtitle:
30+ Cambodian refugees are detained in a Texas detention center, being interviewed by consular officials before they can be deported.

Deportation flights have left just before Christmas for the past two years.

A daughter is raising $ for her dad's fight:
https://gofundme.com/f/help-philly-fight-deportation?utm_medium=copy_link&utm_source=customer&utm_campaign=p_lico+share-sheet¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/wVjPw3znrX

title: Chris Eng
subtitle: With all this talk about how Blade Runner happens tomorrow, I'd just like to say I, for one, am glad we don't live in that horrifying dystopia where a group of refugees fleeing to America for the promise of a better life will instead be hunted down and killed by cops. pic.twitter.com/1Wfqr2YI4M

title: Suzanne Phillips
subtitle: This week's #WCW goes out to Angelina Jolie! After years of dedicated service to UNHCR & the cause of refugees, Angelina Jolie was appointed Special Envoy in April 2012. title: Lenny Teytelman
subtitle:
#Vindman came to US when he was 4. I came when I was 12.

I am from Belarus, he is from adjacent Ukraine. We are Jewish refugees from the USSR. 

Being refugees, welcomed to US, possibly makes us appreciate this country even more. 

https://www.nytimes.com/2019/10/29/us/politics/trump-impeachment.html¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/qPua93I09l
